name: SentenceInventor
0:
”Alexa, open sentence inventor and invent a sentence.”
”Alexa, open sentence inventor and generate words.”
”Alexa, open sentence inventor and generate some text.”
skdetail:

Invocation Name: sentence inventor
Developer Terms of Use
des: Ask Alexa to generate a random sentence using deep learning technology and see what she comes up with. This skill uses a pretrained LSTM model to generate text.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
